label: CropProtectionTreatment
comment: A method or substance, such as chemical fertilizers and crop protection products, applied to plant growth whilst managing and controlling diseases and pests.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A process certificate applicable to this specified crop protection treatment.
A characteristic applicable to this sustainability inspection.
Material used for this specified crop protection treatment.
